Combat
Hit Points: 26 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Rogue: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Ruffian: Defense Trained (Medium Armor)
Kip Up: (F) Allows standing up without triggering reactions
Ruffian: Allows using any simple weapon to sneak attack/Allows use of critical specialization on a critical hit with a d8 or lighter simple weapon on a flat-footed foe
Sneak Attack: +1d6 HP damage vs. flat-footed foe using an agile, finesse, or ranged weapon
Surprise Attack: Allows using Deception or Stealth for initiative to inflict flat-footed on creatures that haven't acted
